data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Jungoli, South Sudan that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jungoli, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Jungoli be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Jungoli that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Jungoli to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Suri, Kacipo-Balesi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Jungoli, South Sudan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Jungoli. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jungoli, South Sudan has a population of 326,400.

We estimate Jungoli has 35,451 people who might know Jesus, 150,085 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 140,864 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Jungoli, South Sudan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Jungoli
location.people_groups_list: Dinka, Central, Lafon, Pari, Morokodo, Nyamusa-Molo, Murle
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dinka, Central (56,000), Lafon, Pari (50,000), Morokodo (48,000), Nyamusa-Molo (1,600), Murle (123,000)
